_sText:
Surf_Mystic_beta

Hi all! This is my first submission here in FPSBANANA and my first surf map so... I hope you like it.

Please test it and report any bug you see or any suggestion to improve it.

If you dont know how to test it without a server then follow this instructions :

Firts go to steam->games tab
Then select CSS->right-click it->properties->set launch options->add the following line :

-tickrate 66

(If you have any option already for example "-console" then it would be "-console -tickrate 66")

Now open CSS->Create Server->Select the map->When it launches open up console and type in "sv_airaccelerate 150" without the "s


Your done, now just surf it ;D
